QueryViewSpec.Name: AddBatchNumberToPostToGL Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Adds the Batch number to the Post to GL.
QueryViewSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select GLTRANSACTION.ID as GLTRANSACTIONID, ACCOUNT as ACCOUNTSTRING, POSTDATE, -- 'R' as TRANTYPE, -- case TRANSACTIONTYPECODE when 0 then 'D' else 'C' end as DEBITCREDIT, -- AMOUNT, -- JOURNAL, -- REFERENCE, -- cast('' as nvarchar(36)) as BATCH, -- PROJECT, -- GLTRANSACTION.BASECURRENCYID, -- BASECURRENCY.ISO4217 as BASECURRENCY, -- BASEEXCHANGERATE.RATE as BASEEXCHANGERATE, -- GLTRANSACTION.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT, -- GLTRANSACTION.TRANSACTIONCURRENCYID, -- TRANSACTIONCURRENCY.ISO4217 as TRANSACTIONCURRENCY, -- GLTRANSACTION.ORGANIZATIONAMOUNT, -- ORGANIZATIONEXCHANGERATE.RATE as ORGANIZATIONEXCHANGERATE, batch.BATCHNUMBER from dbo.GLTRANSACTION left join dbo.CURRENCY as TRANSACTIONCURRENCY on GLTRANSACTION.TRANSACTIONCURRENCYID = TRANSACTIONCURRENCY.ID left join dbo.CURRENCY as BASECURRENCY on GLTRANSACTION.BASECURRENCYID = BASECURRENCY.ID left join dbo.CURRENCYEXCHANGERATE as ORGANIZATIONEXCHANGERATE on GLTRANSACTION.ORGANIZATIONEXCHANGERATEID = ORGANIZATIONEXCHANGERATE.ID left join dbo.CURRENCYEXCHANGERATE as BASEEXCHANGERATE on GLTRANSACTION.BASEEXCHANGERATEID = BASEEXCHANGERATE.ID left join dbo.BATCH on batch.ID = GLTRANSACTION.BATCHID
